channel.title: Lists on Colin Spear
channel.description: Recent content in Lists on Colin Spear

item.description: Reissue labels Numero group From their website: A brief overview of the governing series within our greater catalog: Eccentric Soul - Our flagship series that documents lost soul music Wayfaring Strangers - Compiles privately issued folk music Cult Cargo - Unearths the music of remote island nations Good God! - Praises obscure gospel and spiritual tunes Local Customs - Investigations of mom-and-pop recording outfits 200 Line - Explores punk, hardcore, and artistic rock from the ’80s and ’90s
